entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:04 AM CDT Saturday 22 April 2023
